# BigTreeTech wiki Contributing Guidelines

Thank you for your interest in BigTreeTech wiki project!

## External Contributions

At this time, this project is **not open to external contributions**.

We are currently focusing on internal development and restructuring the workflow. As a result:

- Pull requests from external contributors will not be accepted.
- Issues and Discussions may be reviewed and addressed in future updates.

We appreciate your understanding and support.

## Internal Contributors

If you are an internal developer or a member of the core team:

- Please **refer to the new internal development workflow and guidelines**.
- Make sure you are following the latest processes for:
  - Branch management
  - Commit message conventions
  - Code reviews
  - i18n

### Commit Message and Sign-off Guidelines

All commits from internal contributors **must follow the Conventional Commits specification** and be **signed off**.

### workflow documentation

If you are unsure where to find the new workflow documentation, please contact the Bigtreetech wiki project maintainer or your team lead.

## Future Updates

We may reopen this project to external contributions in the future. When that happens, this document will be updated accordingly.

---

Thank you for your interest in BigTreeTech wiki project!
